lyrics:
I can’t imagin life, without you by my side
This is love yeah, that I’m feelin’
And I’m hopin that you’re feel the same way
Things tend to slip my mind, like how you like to wine
And dine babe, with romantic lights,
You mean a lot to me in so many ways

(Lately) have I told you I love you?
(lately) have I told you you still mean the world to me?
(lately) have I told you I love you?
I’ll be your wish if just you tell me what you want, babe

Don’t think twice of our love, I say these things becouse I love you
But it’s hard to explain, but I’m hopin’ that you’re feelin’ the same way
You know that our love might, feelings are excite and wurthy,
I tend to forget,
How much I L-O-V-E you really mean.

(Lately) have I told you I love you?
(lately) have I told you you still mean the world to me?
(lately) have I told you I love you?
I’ll be your wishing well, tell me what you want, babe

Try you hardest to heal, Yes I forgot but You know how I feel,
Things slip my mind, that’s a fact,
Tell me you love me and I’ll tell you

(freestyle)

(Lately) have I told you I love you?
(lately) have I told you you still mean the world to me?
(lately) have I told you I love you?
I’ll be your wish if just you tell me what you want, babe
